## main

- Add changes here

## 0.1.8 / 2026-01-09

- Added support for optional metric value standard deviations.

## 0.1.7 / 2023-02-05

- Remove python version cap.

## 0.1.6 / 2023-09-11

- More workarounds to handle lack of support for NaN.

## 0.1.5 / 2023-09-08

- Workaround to handle lack of support for NaN in Pydantic 2.0

## 0.1.4 / 2023-07-27

- Implement CI workflow for testing
- Move code from Github to new upstream on Gitlab (code.usgs.gov)
- Fixes to catch up to pydantic 2.0 release

## 0.1.3 / 2023-04-12

- Release is previous to addition of CHANGELOG.md
- Implements the ground motion packet format
